rooms.name: Entrance Hallway
rooms.description: A welcoming entry with Vastu alignment towards the east to invite positive energy.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious living area with Mediterranean decor and large windows for natural light. Open plan design following local norms.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room, offering a communal space for family meals. Vastu aligned facing east or south.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen with Mediterranean touches; designed keeping in mind ventilation and Vastu compliance (kitchen should be away from main entrance).

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Private guest bedroom, located on the quiet side of the bungalow. Includes a small ensuite.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master suite with attached bathroom and closet area; designed for tranquility following Vastu principles (north-east orientation preferred).

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Main ground floor washroom, adhering to local building norms.

rooms.name: Storage/Utility Room
rooms.description: A compact room for storage; includes a small pantry area integrated with the kitchen layout.

openings.description: Primary entry aligned according to Vastu principles, ensuring positive energy flow.
A secondary entrance providing an alternative access point.
Large windows to allow natural light, following Mediterranean aesthetics.
A dedicated opening for pool access on the south side, ensuring privacy and adherence to local building norms.

additional_features.location: East corner of ground floor (adjacent to garden area)
additional_features.description: A compact, budget-friendly pool integrated into the design with safety fencing and drainage considerations.
Small landscaped garden for relaxation with Mediterranean style elements such as pergolas and native plants.

notes: Design follows Mediterranean aesthetics with simple, elegant lines and warm color palettes.
Vastu guidelines have been integrated where possible to enhance the flow of positive energy.
Budget constraints have influenced material choices and design simplicity while ensuring functionality and local norms compliance.
